apps.name: CLP+
apps.description: Clipboard Manager & Notification Center Widget. Copy text from any app, and see it appear in Notification Center. Tap items to copy them back to your clipboard. CLP+ also recognizes content - e.g. URLs & email addresses - so you can use them straight from the app.

apps.description: Create your new signature dish with Spingredients! Select one key ingredient, and Spingredients will select fantastic flavor combinations.

apps.name: notCacti
apps.subtitle: Water & Posture
apps.description: Sitting slumped over a keyboard all day and consuming nothing but coffee and sandwiches is not an ideal way to treat your body.

apps.name: BrowserHub
apps.subtitle: Multi-Browser Launcher
apps.description: You're a web developer, web designer, website tester or website owner - now you can easily test your site on a range of iOS browsers.

apps.name: YoBoard
apps.subtitle: The Yo! Keyboard!
apps.description: Why? Because Yo! This is an iOS8 keyboard for when all you need to say is Yo!
